author: Andreas
content:
Ted, I don't like it either and probably should have searched for a better vehicle to demonstrate DxO's abilities. On top of my list is the unlucky tight crop that resulted from the straightening. You're right, I should have cropped much tighter, and at the heart of this is a lessen: No tool can substitute for judgment.

What I should have done then, is an entirely different story. A zoomed out flash from camera right, with a gel to warm it up, could have made this image.
